There's really no one else in the universe that could've accomplished what Eric Schmidt did. `` I could not be more excited about moving us forward, and we're really only at the beginning,'' Page said. Bernie Sanders , a Vermont independent who's seeking re-election next year, distributed a fundraising appeal to constituents that detailed threats against Arizona Democratic lawmakers in addition to Gabrielle Giffords . It asked whether right-wing reactionaries, through threats and acts of violence, intimidated people with different points of view from expressing their political positions in the state.
